DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , randomize study parallel group subject present low back pain . Randomized subject receive treatment 60 day either combination nucleotide vitamin B12 vitamin B1+B6+B12 .
DOC.brief_title: Nucleotides B Vitamins Treatment Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , randomize study parallel group subject present low back pain . Randomized subject receive treatment 60 day either combination nucleotide vitamin B12 vitamin B1+B6+B12 . The aim study evaluate compare therapeutic effect combination nucleotide + vitamin B12 combination vitamin B1 , B6 B12 low back pain . Safety efficacy monitor throughout treatment period . Subjects randomize double-blind fashion either treatment group .
DOC.criteria: Patients gender , least 18 year age Clinical presentation acute lumbago ( < 3 day initial visit , without functional alteration , medium intensity : Visual Analog Pain score 20mm 80mm Female subject postmenopausal use birth control Subjects must sign informed consent document Intolerance component study treatment Pregnancy breastfeed Need surgical treatment Use analgesic drug dyshematopoiesis coagulation disorder Gastric intestinal ulcer Gastrointestinal , cerebrovascular , bleed Creatinine > 3x % reference range Urea , ALT , AST , GGT > 2x % reference range Any disease condition investigator 's opinion exclude subject study
